title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Autonomous Web3 agents on AWS (DAT457)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - AWS上的自主Web3代理 (DAT457)
abstract: In this code talk, we will demonstrate how to leverage Amazon Bedrock AgentCore and Strands Agents SDK to build a crypto AI agent that can query real-time and historical blockchain data to perform analysis, execute on-chain transactions using integrated wallets, and more. Learn how to build an agent programmatically that can retrieve data from topic-specific knowledge bases, query historical public blockchain data provided by Open Data on AWS, query for real-time data, and sign blockchain transactions with AWS KMS
abstract_cn: 在这个代码演讲中，我们将演示如何利用Amazon Bedrock AgentCore和Strands Agents SDK构建一个加密货币AI代理，该代理可以查询实时和历史区块链数据来执行分析，使用集成钱包执行链上交易等功能。学习如何以编程方式构建一个代理，该代理可以从特定主题的知识库中检索数据，查询AWS开放数据提供的历史公共区块链数据，查询实时数据，并使用AWS KMS签署区块链交易
